State Class Reference

State class (part of a state machine – SMach)

#include <State.hpp>

struct  transition_t
 Exit condition list entry. More...
 

Public Member Functions

virtual const char * name ()
 Returns the name of a state.
 
virtual bool entry_action (void)
 Action called when entering state.
 
virtual bool action (void)
 Action called when state is active.
 
virtual State * exit_condition (State *list[])
 Checks to see if it is time to exit the state (optionally executes an exit action)
 
virtual bool transition (const char *name)
 Called when exiting to the state specified by name. More...
 

Static Public Member Functions

static State * find (State *list[], const char *name)
 Searches a state list for name.
 
static bool valid (State *ptr)
 Checks to see if ptr is a valid state.
 
static State * invalid ()
 Returns a pointer to an invalid state.
 

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool State::transition ( const char *  name)
inlinevirtual

This is called when the state is about to exit.

Parameters
nameName of target state
Returns
true if it is OK to proceed with transition and false to abort transition
